title: Penguin's Christmas Wish
description: Geisel Honor-winning author/illustrator Salina Yoon's beloved character Penguin celebrates the season in Penguin's Christmas Wish-- a charming picture book that's perfect for the holidays.Penguin can't wait to celebrate Christmas with his family and friends.
